chapter.title: Managing the Forge project
chapter.para: In Novaforge, there are two special spaces: the Forge project and the Forge repository. This chapter describes the purpose of the Forge project and how to manage it.

sect1.title: Purpose of the Forge project
sect1.para: The purpose of the Forge project is to share information and applications for all forge users. By default, all forge users are members of this project.

The simplest case of use is sharing of information (good practices, technical wiki) within a company. For example, we could easily consider giving a wiki or a document management application to all forge users.

sect1.title: Administrating the Forge project
sect1.para: From the technical point of view, the forge project is a project just like the others. It can only be administrated by administrators of this project of the forge administrator via the menu Project administration/The forge project".

Apart from its special roles, the forge project is administrated just like any other project. The following roles are available via the menu "Your memberships" section :
Administrator: forge project administrator
Super Administrator: forge administrator (= administrator of all forge projects)
Member: forge member
Like other projects we can create a application space and add application via the menu "Your applications"
